safetyTips: Gloves are worn at all stages during production.
name: SILVER & SPECIAL
description: Handmade sterling silver keepsake jewellery featuring your loved ones’ fingerprints, handprints, footprints, paw prints, handwriting and drawing. Also sending out personalised keyrings, thank you tokens and pocket hugs during lockdown.  Orders can be taken via messages on Facebook or Instagram, email or phone. Print taking kits will be prepared following COVID 19 safety guidance and sent via Royal Mail.  Perfect personalised gifts while you’re unable to get to the shops. Allow 2-3 weeks for bespoke silver jewellery. Tokens and hugs can be sent within a few days.
